item.title: Report X-2025030437
item.description:
Report X-2025030437

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-16T21:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-03
  • City: MONTROSE
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: IT WAS DISCOVERED ON THE TAIL END OF TRUCK AS HE WAS ON ROUTE. HE SAW THE HAZMAT LEAKING AND IMMETIALY STOPPED HIS TRUCK AND OPEN THE TRUCK TO VENT. THE SOURCE WAS ALREADY STOPPED AND HE CALLED THE MONTROSE CENTER SO THAT A DESIGNATED RESPONDER COULD RESPOND. RESPONDER WAS DRIVING OUT TO LOCATION AND FOUND THE SOURCE HAD STOPPED AND CONTAINED IT DONNING PPE. THE PACKAGE WAS SAFELY TRANSPORTED BACK AND THE DRIVER WAS ABLE TO GO BACK ON ROUTE.
